Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone! I have been a backer / player of Kerbal Space Program for well over a year now, and I wanted to try out the forms! I am a Canadian pilot in real life, and love aviation, as well as astronomy. Kerbal Space Program is a remarkable game, with a super better community!!

Just wanted to say hello, and hopefully see you out there!

Supersonicclank
Hello Supersonicclank. How does on pilot a Canadian?
